mapper.sql: id, fund_code, fund_type, fund_name, fund_mger, compy_name, fund_status, risk_level, fund_rating, fund_scale, issue_organ, gmt_creat, yn, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from fund_product_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fund_product_info (id, fund_code, fund_type, fund_name, fund_mger, compy_name, fund_status, risk_level, fund_rating, fund_scale, issue_organ, gmt_creat, yn, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundMger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueOrgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
